review: To day I saw this movie Sept 2018 on Dungal.I have been very fan of films.After a long period I saw Meri Biwi ka Jawaab Nahin(2004).In my view it is a mile stone  and unique movie.Best of Akshay&Shridevi.

Really amazing ..N also bz I'm big fan of akshay kumar ..But the acting of sridevi in this movie is superb .
Nice story overall this is superb .
